title: CoWorking Space with Private Zoom Room, Ceiling Heights up to 10' 4"*
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 798 - 950 Sq.
Kurve on Wilshire is an iconic new address that’s rethinking high-rise living by bringing together designer apartment residences with an acre of elevated rooftop amenities and outdoor spaces.
It’s the perfect mix of energetic city living balanced by access to the outdoors, an abundance of airy, organic retreats and a focus on wellness.
Kurve is coming soon, so register today to be one of the first to call it home.

Plank-style Wood Flooring, Built-in Coffee System*, European Cabinetry with Integrated Lighting, Private Balconies*, Keyless Entry System, Designer Faucets and Fixtures, Walk-in Closets with Custom Storage, Culinary-Level WOLF Appliances with Gas Range*, Integrated Smart Home System*, 9' 4" Ceiling Heights, Stainless Steel Appliances by LG,
Ecobee SmartHome Thermostats, LG Washer & Dryer, Ceiling Heights up to 10' 4"*, Under-Counter Wine Storage*, Private Balconies, Asko Washer & Dryer*, Floor-to-Ceiling Windows

Fireside Lounge & Hammock Garden, CoWorking Space with Private Zoom Room, Pet Park with Outdoor Grooming Station, Entertaining Kitchen with Private Dining Area, Fitness Studio with Outdoor Yoga Space, Outdoor Pool & Spa with Private Cabanas, Spin Studio with On-Demand Classes, Sports Lounge with Bar and Billiards, Indoor-Outdoor Lounges, One Acre Rooftop Park & Pool, Outdoor Grills, Korean BBQ and Open-Air Dining, Outdoor Movie Theater
